DataElement.preferredName: Observation Performed Study Activity Body Position Code Sentinel CDM BP Body Position Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._The spatial property of a body; where it is or the way in which it is situated.:A symbol or combination of symbols which are given certain arbitrary meanings within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation._Position for orthostatic blood pressure. If unknown, leave blank.

Executed and carried through to completion.

An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Sentinel CDM BP Body Position Code
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Position for orthostatic blood pressure. If unknown, leave blank.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The state or act of one who sits; the posture of one who occupies a seat.

Concepts.definition: The state or act of one who sits; the posture of one who occupies a seat.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The act of assuming or maintaining an erect upright position.

Concepts.definition: The act of assuming or maintaining an erect upright position.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A posterior recumbent body position whereby the person lies on its back and faces upward.

Concepts.definition: A posterior recumbent body position whereby the person lies on its back and faces upward.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
